Articles.Content: I am running the Contract Window + mod it work great but when I am on the pad or in space it wont come up.  I have looked and all I can find is from 2017 I think it was, and all it said was try F2 but that does not work.  Any ideas on how to fix this or does anyone know of a mod that does the same thing?

18 hours ago, Primal68 said:

I am running the Contract Window + mod it work great but when I am on the pad or in space it wont come up.  I have looked and all I can find is from 2017 I think it was, and all it said was try F2 but that does not work.  Any ideas on how to fix this or does anyone know of a mod that does the same thing?

does it have dependencies? If yes, then do you have them installed? Also, what ksp version are you running on?
